Author: BakersDozenBagels
Description: Use your expert's module as well as your own in tandem in this Simpleton lookalike. Tags: blue-button, push-it
Name: Double Defuser

Souvenir.Explanation:
Souvenir could hide and ask about the letters displayed on the module at the end.
Souvenir could ask about the label/color of the second button press. (Specifically, the one not used by the module.)
